item.description:
Tickets sold at the door only.  Doors at 8.  I'll be there by 7:45!  I don't know where to meet at the venue, since it's only been open for like, a month now.  Shall we meet out front?  If you RSVP yes I'll make sure you have my cell #.  If you don't know if you can make it but might want to, msg me and I'll give you my contact info in case you want to meet!

11/30: Sarah Rabdau & Self-Employed Assassins / Pearl & the Beard / Box Five ($7) Radio: https://www.facebook.... Pearl and the Beard: http://www.myspace.co... PATB doing a cover of Bon Iver doing a cover - AMAZING: http://www.youtube.co...
item.name: Pearl and the Beard
